description: The MacBook Pro 16" with M3 Max chip delivers unparalleled performance for creators and developers, with a Liquid Retina XDR display and long battery life.
The Dell XPS 15 features a stunning OLED 4K display, 13th Gen Intel processor, and a sleek aluminum chassis built for productivity and media.
With a flexible 2-in-1 design, OLED display, and long battery life, the Spectre x360 is perfect for creative professionals on the go.
The Zephyrus G14 is a compact powerhouse with Ryzen 9 and RTX 4070 graphics, ideal for gamers and creators.
A business-class laptop with legendary durability, the ThinkPad X1 Carbon offers lightweight design, fast performance, and robust security features.
Built for gamers and creators, the Blade 16 features a dual-mode Mini-LED display and top-tier NVIDIA RTX graphics for stunning performance.
The Surface Laptop 5 combines elegant design with touchscreen versatility, Intel Evo performance, and all-day battery life.
With a sleek chassis and powerful hardware, the MSI Stealth 17 is built for both gaming and content creation on the go.
Ultra-light and ultra-large, the LG Gram 17 offers productivity with a massive screen and all-day battery in a featherweight body.
